article.headline: AstraZeneca may resume halted COVID-19 vaccine trial next week: report
article.body: AstraZeneca AZN, +1.16% AZN, +0.63% may resume its halted trial of its COVID-19 vaccine as early as next week, the Financial Times reported, citing people familiar with the matter. The company halted the trial after the discovery of a sick participant, who contracted transverse myelitis, the report said. The trial may see further pauses, the report said, citing a person close to the process.
